# GettingStartedInputFile.tcl -- Model: Plans

__NOTOC__ ```Tcl

  1. Plan

addModelData ModelLabel 2x2Floor addModelData ModelDescription "1-Bay by 1-Bay Floor Plan" addModelData ModelTypeLabel Plan addModelData iVerticalGridLineLabel "0.0 10.0 25.0" addModelData iHorizontalGridLineLabel "A B C" addModelData -HorizontalBayWidth Bay 1 Width 20*\$ft addModelData -HorizontalBayWidth Bay 2 Width 30*\$ft addModelData -VerticalBayWidth BayRange "1 2" Width 5*\$ft addModel

```
